description:
Document Specialist Coordinator for TalentZok

Overview

Are you looking for a new career opportunity with an exciting company?! Then we have got the right team for you! In this role, you are responsible for the duties listed below.

Immediate opening for a Document Specialist Coordinator in Redlands, CA who possesses:

  • Experience with Microsoft Office applications
  • Bilingual Spanish a plus
  • Good proofreading and editing skills

Email resumes to lruiz@talentzok.com or call 951-667-1956.

Full Description

Document Specialist Coordinator Responsibilities:

  • Take incoming billing mail and sort it
  • Help enter initial billing info into system
  • File and relay billing info to correct department
  • Follow ups on reports that need to be sent or sent to correct department
  • Communicate with billing department on information input
  • Follow up with doctors/attorneys as needed

Document Specialist Coordinator Requirements

  • Bilingual Spanish a huge plus
  • Good spelling/grammar/punctuation skills
  • Working knowledge of medical terminology
  • Experience with billing data entry a plus

$18-$19 DOE

For immediate and confidential consideration,

Email resumes to lruiz@talentzok.com or call 951-667-1956
